summary: A comprehensive suite of integration tests that exercise Conan's dependency graph functionality, covering requirement overrides, graph traversal, platform and system requirements, remote resolution, repackaging, replace-requires, version conflict handling, binary and build skipping, test requirements, and build validation.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of Conan's package dependency resolution and graph management across diverse scenarios, ensuring reliable package builds, overrides, and tool handling for endâ€‘users.
